com.airs.handlers
Interface Handler

All Known Implementing Classes:
AudioHandler, BeaconHandler, BloodPressureButtonHandler, CalendarHandler, CellHandler, EventButtonHandler, EventTextHandler, GPSHandler, HeartMonitorHandler, MediaWatcherHandler, MoodButtonHandler, MusicPlayerHandler, NotificationHandler, PhoneSensorHandler, RandomHandler, SystemHandler, WeatherHandler, WifiHandler
public interface Handler

Interface for sensor handlers
